snippet.title: PICROSS S2 Trailer (Nintendo Switch)
snippet.description:
A new mode has been added to Picross S Series!
Collect the puzzle pieces, solve them,
and put them together to complete a story!
Picross first debuted on Nintendo hardware over 20 years ago, and has seen iterations of the beloved puzzle game ever since. 
New modes and functions have been added to Picross S2. Please enjoy.
